articles.author: Asif Iqbal Shaik
articles.title: One UI 8 leak shows new functionality for the Now Bar - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung has released the One UI 7.0 update for the Galaxy Z Flip 5 and the Galaxy Z Fold 5 in India. It was released in South Korea last week. This is the second major Android OS update for these foldable phones which were launched in 2023. Other countries an…
articles.content: Samsung has released the April 2025 software update for the Galaxy S25 series in the USA. The update is currently available for factory-unlocked units and brings charging animation and media player w… [+1451 chars]
